evidence.claim: Care Connectors utilizes AWS for their cloud services.
The platform adheres to HIPAA compliance standards.
They use FHIR APIs for healthcare data interoperability.
Integration with EHR systems via HL7 protocols is mentioned on their documentation page.
Care Connectors partners with cloud providers like Azure to host their applications securely.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction use cases found on the site.
